thread.title: WATCH: James Corden stumbles in Grammy Awards opening — literally
thread.title_full: WATCH: James Corden stumbles in Grammy Awards opening — literally

author: KATE FELDMAN
title: WATCH: James Corden stumbles in Grammy Awards opening — literally
text:
19 PM 
James Corden stumbled and tripped his way onto the stage to open the Grammy Awards Sunday night. 
The host ranted about his failed rehearsals as his lift got stuck and he fell through the rafters. 
Yelling at his backup dancers, Corden called for a do-over before breaking into a rap about his missteps, the biggest nominees of the night and even a short list of musical deaths from 2016. James Corden staged a disastrous opening to the 2017 Grammy Awards. (Kevin Winter/Getty Images for NARAS) 
Corden even got in a slight dig at President Trump — although that likely won’t be his only of the night — saying “we don’t know what comes next” under the new administration. Join the Conversation:
